Package org.demoiselle.signer.core

Class CertificateLoaderImpl

java.lang.Object
org.demoiselle.signer.core.CertificateLoaderImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CertificateLoader
public class CertificateLoaderImpl extends Object implements CertificateLoader
Implements the basic methods for loading a certificate depending on the storage format
